definition: not reflecting light, the property of having little or no contrast, change texture so as to become matted and felt-like
details:
adjective
- not reflecting light
= synonyms: flat
noun
- the property of having little or no contrast
= synonyms: mat
- a mixture of sulfides that forms when sulfide metal ores are smelted
verb
- change texture so as to become matted and felt-like
= synonyms: mat
